author: Coral Barry For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Liverpool news: Fans come up with crazy theories about why John W Henry is at Barcelona game | Metro News
text:
Coral Barry for Metro.co.uk Sunday 19 Feb 2017 9:20 pm John Henry and his wife, Linda, were in the Nou Camp crowd on Sunday (Picture: Getty) 
Liverpool owner John W Henry attended Barcelona‚Äôs La Liga game against Leganes on Sunday night and his presence sparked an online frenzy from Reds fans. 
Henry and Tom Werner own Liverpool under the Fenway Sports Group umbrella and the former was in the stands with his wife Linda Pizzuti Henry to watch Barcelona play. 
It was Barcelona‚Äôs first game since being beaten 4-0 by Paris Saint-Germain in the Champions League. 
Mrs Henry sent out the following tweet expressing her delight at finally getting to see a game at the famous Nou Camp. At the enormous Camp Nou for the first time ‚Äì FC Barcelona vs Legan√©s ‚öΩÔ∏èüèÉ #FCBLegan√©s #campnou pic.twitter.com/HMHc0Fu0jn 
‚Äî Linda Pizzuti Henry (@Linda_Pizzuti) February 19, 2017 
Innocent enough at first sight, but the tweet sparked a wide response from eagle eyed Liverpool supporters. 
From theorising buying back Luis Suarez to negotiating a fee for the current main man Philippe Coutinho, the Liverpool faithful‚Äôs imaginations ran riot. @Linda_Pizzuti @OwenSeanMurphy @FCBarcelona won't even show up to LFCs games
